 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעוּשׁ‎</span> (also [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יעישׁ‎</span>) **proper name, masculine** (probably ***he comes to help***, [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl (1886), 168</sup>; = Arabic proper name, of divinity. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#We|We]]<sup>Skizzen iii, 171</sup>; Heid. 2, 146 [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 218 (compare Sem i. 43)</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>l.c.</sup>, yet against this [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ιεους</span> (i.e. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; not <span class="bdbLangGreek">Ιαγους</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְ‎</span> (not <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָ‎</span>), [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>M ii. 77; BN 133</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Edom. 48 f.</sup>); — 

**1.** son of Esau [[Gen.36.5|Gen 36:5]]; [[Gen.36.14|Gen 36:14]] (both [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יעישׁ‎</span>), v[[Gen.36.18|Gen 36:18]]; [[1Chr.1.35|1Chr 1:35]]. 

**2.** Benjamites: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** [[1Chr.7.10|1Chr 7:10]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יעישׁ‎</span>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** [[1Chr.8.39|1Chr 8:39]]. 

**3.** a Levite [[1Chr.23.10|1Chr 23:10]]; [[1Chr.23.11|1Chr 23:11]]. 

**4.** son of Rehoboam [[2Chr.11.19|2Chr 11:19]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺעָשׁ‎</span> see above.
